title: Weather Forecast Response
content: Today's forecast includes light rain with temperatures between 18°C and 25°C. Expect clear skies by the evening.

title: System Maintenance Notice
content: Scheduled maintenance will take place on Saturday between 2 AM and 4 AM UTC. Some services may be temporarily unavailable.

title: New Feature Release
content: We’ve introduced dark mode support in the latest version. You can enable it under user preferences.

title: Payment Confirmation
content: Your recent payment of $49.99 has been successfully processed. Transaction ID: TX-204582.

title: Survey Invitation
content: We'd love your feedback! Participate in our short survey to help us improve future releases.

title: Security Update
content: A new security patch has been deployed. Please restart your API client to ensure all updates are applied.

title: Subscription Renewal
content: Your annual subscription has been renewed successfully. Next billing cycle will start on Nov 15, 2025.

title: Weekly Analytics Report
content: This week's analytics report is ready. Overall engagement increased by 8% with a 3% rise in API usage frequency.

title: Data Export Completed
content: Your requested data export has finished. You can download your CSV files from the dashboard under 'Exports'.

title: Community Update
content: Join our new developer community forum for the latest tips, release updates, and support discussions.
